@kdkhh

Do the following mate:

copy apk and data folder anywhere on your device .(do not put data on obb folder yet )

install apk and now copy "com.gameloft.android.ANMP.GloftKRHM" folder
to android/obb/ folder.

disable automatic time and date .change year to 2010.

run the game

you must change the year before each time you want to play the game and just tick automatic time and date option after playing to return to present

The point that we must carefull is to change the date and the automatic date because due to this the date change automatically and the game gives black screen
